scripts.build-atlasmaker: webpack --mode production --config webpack.atlasmaker.config.js && cp view/atlasmaker/dist/atlasmaker.js public/lib/atlasmaker.js
scripts.build-atlasmaker-tools: webpack --mode production --config webpack.atlasmaker-tools.config.js && cp  -r view/atlasmaker/dist/atlasmaker-tools public/lib/
scripts.build-brainbox: webpack --mode production --config webpack.brainbox.config.js && cp view/brainbox/dist/brainbox.js public/lib/brainbox.js
scripts.build-pages: webpack --mode production --config webpack.pages.config.js && cp view/brainbox/dist/*-page.js public/js/
scripts.build: npm run build-atlasmaker && npm run build-atlasmaker-tools && npm run build-brainbox && npm run build-pages
scripts.dev-atlasmaker: webpack --mode development --config webpack.atlasmaker.config.js && cp view/atlasmaker/dist/atlasmaker.js public/lib/atlasmaker.js
scripts.dev-atlasmaker-tools: webpack --mode development --config webpack.atlasmaker-tools.config.js && cp  -r view/atlasmaker/dist/atlasmaker-tools public/lib/
scripts.dev-brainbox: webpack --mode development --config webpack.brainbox.config.js && cp view/brainbox/dist/brainbox.js public/lib/brainbox.js
scripts.dev-pages: webpack --mode development --config webpack.pages.config.js && cp view/brainbox/dist/*-page.js public/js/
scripts.dev: npm run dev-atlasmaker && npm run dev-atlasmaker-tools && npm run dev-brainbox && npm run dev-pages
scripts.test: docker exec brainbox_web_1 /bin/bash -c 'cd /brainbox && npm run mocha-test'
